si.title: අවශ්ය ජාතියේ සම්මේලනය
body_lines: දෙමළ රාජ්ය පක්ෂයේ මගේ ආදරණීය ශිෂ්යාව විවිධ සුදුසුකම් ඇති නමුත් ඔහුට දෙමළ ජාතිකත්වයක් නොමැත. ඔහු පාර්ලිමේන්තු මන්ත්රී එම්.ඒ.

en.title: Federation for the nation required
body_lines: Although my dear student in the Tamil state party has a variety of qualifications, he does not have a Tamil nationality. He pointed out parliamentarian MA Sumanthiran that he was not able to see everything from the brain and feel the emotion.

summary_lines: Despite his qualifications, a Tamil state party member lacks Tamil nationality, highlighting the need for national unity and understanding beyond mere credentials.
